item.title: About me
item.author: colon.melvin@gmail.com (Colon Melvin)
item.description: Hi there! This blog is focused on cloud architecture, migrations, and automation. I’ll be sharing what I’m learning with Python, PowerShell, Terraform, and a few other adventures. Thanks for stopping by! My Background From building a dial-up ISP in the year 2000, from tech support, senior systems engineer, to cloud architect! I’ve worn many of the IT hats over the years and have a deep appreciation for using technology to improve the world around us.
